PtSituationElement.Summary: b/d [3] train shuttle bus is detoured, due to construction on Livonia Av. See mta.info
PtSituationElement.Description:
Due to construction on Livonia Av, [3] [SB] train shuttle buses are detoured.

Detour is as follows:

Ashford St Bound: Via Livonia Av, right on Warwick St, left on New Lots Av, right on Ashford St and regular route.

Utica Av Bound: Via New Lots Av, right on Ashford St, right on Hegeman Av, right on Van Siclen Av, left on Livonia Av and regular route.

Allow additional travel time.
PtSituationElement.LongDescription: Due to construction on Livonia Av, [3] [SB] train shuttle buses are detoured. Detour is as follows: Ashford St Bound: Via Livonia Av, right on Warwick St, left on New Lots Av, right on Ashford St and regular route. Utica Av Bound: Via New Lots Av, right on Ashford St, right on Hegeman Av, right on Van Siclen Av, left on Livonia Av and regular route. Allow additional travel time.

PtSituationElement.Summary: [SIR] Trains board at the Tottenville-bound platform from Arthur Kill to Prince's Bay Stations
PtSituationElement.Description: [SIR] Trains board at the Tottenville-bound platform from Arthur Kill to Prince's Bay Stations
PtSituationElement.LongDescription: <b>[SIR] Trains board at the Tottenville-bound platform from Arthur Kill to Prince's Bay Stations</b>Days, 9 AM to 3 PM, Mon to Fri, Jun 12 - 16<br><br> Boarding change includes <b>Arthur Kill</b>, <b>Richmond Valley</b>, <b>Pleasant Plains</b> and <br> <b>Prince's Bay Stations</b>.<br><b><br>
